channel.title: Fantasy on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Fantasy on Chaotic Online

item.title: Battle Lessons
item.description: In this episode Tom gets to know more about the main event in Chaotic: The CodeMasters Matches!

item.title: Battledrome of the Sexes
item.description: In this episode, we’ll discover (or not) who plays Chaotic better, men or women, boys or girls, in a fight between Peyton and Krystella.

item.title: Buggin' Out
item.description: In this episode we’ll know another of the four Tribes in Chaotic, the Danians, a Tribe formed by insects of all kinds that take the safety of their domains seriously, especially when it comes to Chaotic players.

item.title:
Castle Bodhran or Bust
(Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet the story of Reginald Terrington, the problems in which he got himself and the friends’ group attempt to rescue him with a bet that could mean the end of the career in Chaotic of one of them.

item.title:
Castle Bodhran or Bust
(Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode, Tom comes face-to-face with his hero, but before he could even try to rescue Reggie, he must not only gain his trust but also fight a real battle against another Tribe along with his friends.

item.title: Crash Course
item.description: In this episode, Kaz faces Klay in a dispute while Tom tries to get the scan of a lunatic Creature whose life is playing tricks.

item.title: Everything's in Flux
item.description: In this episode we’ll know a little more about Krystella, a player as unprincipled as Klay that does everything, no matter what, to succeed or to prevent those who cross her path to succeed themselves.

item.title: Lord of Treachery
item.description: In this episode, we’ll meet the treacherous Lord Van Bloot, second in command of the Underworld, and how Chaor makes of Kaz his spy and uses the Chaotic battles as a military strategy against him

item.title: Over Under Rent Asunder
item.description: The ancient war between Good vs. Evil in the Chaotic universe: OverWorld vs. UnderWorld.

item.title: Shifting Sands
item.description: In this episode Peyton shows to Tom that not all of the Mipedians are cruel and pitiless as those he met while rescuing Reggie.

item.title: The Birth of Borth-Majar
item.description: In this episode we will know the origins of an unusual creature, Borth-Majar, and how Kaz deals with his collective individually personality (what? O.o)

item.title: The Thing About Bodal
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Bodal, a Creature very talkative, annoying and cocky about himself. We’ll also see the most improbable of all fights in Chaotic.

item.title: Unexpected
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet the fourth member of the group, Peyton, and his… “eccentric”, personality.

item.title:
Welcome to Chaotic
(Part 1)
item.description: In the first episode of the series, the protagonist, Tom Majors, receives his access code for Chaotic, a place where, according to his best friend, Kaz, you can turn into the Creatures and play for real.

item.title:
Welcome to Chaotic
(Part 2)
item.description: In continuation of the series, after entering his access code, Tom discovers that all of Kaz’s fantasies were real and has his first battle in Chaotic
